data.message: Question- Houston Chilean Consulate had created a page quite sometime ago.  The only purpose was to have the Chilean Community somewhere to stay connected and to share significant news.  This morning it no longer exists.... it says the link was broken and page no longer exists.  What can we do to get it back up and running?  The site does not sale anything.  Any assistance will be greatly appreciated.  The page was called Consulado de Chile en Houston.

replies.message: Hi Gema. If one of the Pages you admin recently disappeared, please use this form to tell us more: http://on.fb.me/1TDh4ZS. Thanks. -Azaria
Facebook I would like a response. You are responding to everyone else. I want to know why I have been blocked from "LIKING" ANY pages??? Let's get this fixed.
